Uses of Package
xxl.core.xxlinq

Packages that use xxl.core.xxlinq
xxl.core.xxlinq   
xxl.core.xxlinq.columns   
 

Classes in xxl.core.xxlinq used by xxl.core.xxlinq
AdvPredicate
          A (AdvResultSet)MetaData-aware Predicate on Tuples to be used mainly in JOINS and WHERE-clauses of the AdvTupleCursor.
AdvResultSetMetaData
           
AdvTupleCursor
          A Cursor wrapping another Cursor/Iterator/Iterable to a Tuple Cursor with AdvResultSetMetaData and CompositeMetaData.
AdvTupleCursor.CachingStrategy
          The Caching-Strategy to be used in a query's AdvTupleCursors:
ALL: Cache within all operators of a query NONE: Don't cache at all ONLY_FIRST: Only cache the first cursor so the Elements of the Input-Cursor don't have to be mapped to Tuples again after reset().
AdvTupleCursor.JOIN_TYPE
           
AggregateColumn
           
CorrTuplesReceiver
          Classes should implement this interface, if they need Correlated Tuples.
OperatorImplementation
          This class implements all relational operators used by AdvTupleCursor as static functions.
 

Classes in xxl.core.xxlinq used by xxl.core.xxlinq.columns

          A (AdvResultSet)MetaData-aware Predicate on Tuples to be used mainly in JOINS and WHERE-clauses of the AdvTupleCursor.
AdvResultSetMetaData
           
AdvTupleCursor
          A Cursor wrapping another Cursor/Iterator/Iterable to a Tuple Cursor with AdvResultSetMetaData and CompositeMetaData.
CorrTuplesReceiver
          Classes should implement this interface, if they need Correlated Tuples.
